title: [LFM] Top and mid lane ( Gold - plat)
body:
HI we are looking for mid lane and top lane player that can play regularly. (we play pretty much every night). we are friendly and looking to improve together as a team, so hopefully we can find 2 more people that have the same mindset :) 

Add me in game: Blaster 

thanks!

replies.body:
hello :)
I'm a gold 2 top laner looking for a good ranked team to climb with, and learn from. I play regularly and really want to improve as a player, and a teammate.
add me in game if still interested :)
Pixel Panda
